title: The impact of new VAT enforcement on financial performance: Evidence from Saudi Arabia non-financial listed companies using the event study and ARMA model
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Mohammed Ibrahim Al-Otaibi, Normaziah Mohd Nor, Yusniyati Yusri, Nedaa Guzaiz
